blog.title: Run for your Life
blog.description: Ania. 23. Poland. THIS BLOG IS CURRENTLY A MICHAEL SHEEN MESS. I’m sorry. Tennant is my hero, I ship DTxGT because they are adorable, The Doctor x Rose, Lucifer x Chloe, I love Alec Hardy with my whole heart and still am not okay that Hardy x Miller didn’t happen, I read too much fanfics and still have a soft spot for Downey Jr. Hello!

summary: What right did Michael Sheen (who I have only seen play assholes and vaguely creepy side characters, but great at both) have to...
body:
What right did Michael Sheen (who I have only seen play assholes and vaguely creepy side characters, but great at both) have to come into my life with his gentle portrayal of pining love and throw my record completely off the turn table???

That one fucking, crystal clear moment and I went “THAT, that right there is what I want to do with my life. I don’t know if I want to be the writer, the actor, or the director but THAT is what I want to do. What I need to do.”

How fucking dare you, sir?!

reblog.comment:
What right did Michael Sheen (who I have only seen play assholes and vaguely creepy side characters, but great at both) have to come into my life with his gentle portrayal of pining love and throw my record completely off the turn table???

That one fucking, crystal clear moment and I went “THAT, that right there is what I want to do with my life. I don’t know if I want to be the writer, the actor, or the director but THAT is what I want to do. What I need to do.”

How fucking dare you, sir?!

trail.content_raw:
What right did Michael Sheen (who I have only seen play assholes and vaguely creepy side characters, but great at both) have to come into my life with his gentle portrayal of pining love and throw my record completely off the turn table???

That one fucking, crystal clear moment and I went “THAT, that right there is what I want to do with my life. I don’t know if I want to be the writer, the actor, or the director but THAT is what I want to do. What I need to do.”

How fucking dare you, sir?!
trail.content:
What right did Michael Sheen (who I have only seen play assholes and vaguely creepy side characters, but great at both) have to come into my life with his gentle portrayal of pining love and throw my record completely off the turn table???

That one fucking, crystal clear moment and I went “THAT, that right there is what I want to do with my life. I don’t know if I want to be the writer, the actor, or the director but THAT is what I want to do. What I need to do.”

How fucking dare you, sir?!

blog.name: eros-heartache
blog.title: Eros Heartache
blog.description: 100% NOT here for anyone to validate me, Multifandom shitposter, Hedonist/Libertine, random other shit.... Message from Me: You own your shit, you walk your talk. Its fantastic to be loved and happy, but own the knowlege you can and will be a problematic person to someone. You can be hated with validity and with take ownership of your faults. In the end you will never make yourself anything more than the sum of your life, perceptions and expierance. And that wisdom my loves, Is what makes all the diffence.
